text: For a quick review of eating slower tips, see the attached information for today's activity.
Team Activity: Observe and Identify your environmental eating cues.
Repeat yesterday's Team Activity: Observe and identify your environmental eating cues.
For optimal health, choose foods that pass through the digestive system relatively quickly.
Slow eaters are everywhere! Notice and mimic their slow eating techniques whenever possible.
Your sense of taste and textures come alive when you eat slower, especially healthier (non-processed) foods.
With consistent practice, eating slower becomes easier and doable under most circumstances.
See todayâ€™s activity attached information for a new strategy for eating slower and mindfully when you are in a hurry or pressed for time.
Learn how you can start to make eating slower a daily reality just by listening to your favorite tune.
Have you become more aware of how fast or slower you eat most meals and snacks?
Eliminate at least one more distraction today when you eat your meals and snacks.
The Eat Slower habit wraps up today and we start a new habit tomorrow.
